name: Dessertlover's Classic Caramel Sauce
author: Karin Martinez
summary: This is your basic caramel sauce, nothing fancy. In my opinion, a good starter recipe to maybe change to your liking afterwards.
directions: Bring the water, sugar, and butter to a simmer in a saucepan over medium heat
Do not stir the mixture until the sugar has completely dissolved in the water
Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the caramel has turned golden brown, 5 to 10 minutes
Carefully pour in a slow, steady stream of cream into the caramel while stirring constantly
The hot caramel will boil vigorously when the cream is added and solidify in areas
Add the vanilla extract and salt
Continue stirring over low heat until the caramel is smooth and creamy, 5 to 10 minutes more
Allow to cool for at least half an hour before using
